title: Apple - Map URL scheme
body:
I would like to be able to pin point a location on a map.

To do so I'm following this documentation.

Example

http://maps.apple.com/?q=45.495409133484,-73.557682800571

What is missing

I would like to be able to zoom more on the map using the z parameter. Also I would like to be able to get a custom label such as Hey the point is here

I can't really make up my mind on how to use the doc to do what I'd like to achieve
